Job Type : Fresher / Experienced

Minimum Qualification : B.E, B.Tech, B.C.A, M.C.A

Skills Required : JSP / Servlets, Web Frameworks like Struts / Spring, Service Oriented Architecture / Web Services – SOAP / REST, Web Technologies like HTML,CSS, Javascript and JQuery ,Markup Languages like XML and JSON.

Job Description :

Design and develop high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems, delivering high-availability and performance in Java.
Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle.
Write well designed, testable, efficient code.
Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies.
Defines site objectives by analyzing user requirements; envisioning system features and functionality.
Designs and develops user interfaces by setting expectations and features priorities throughout development life cycle; determining design methodologies and tool sets; completing programming using languages and software products; designing and conducting tests.
Supports users by developing documentation and assistance tools.
Updates job knowledge by researching new technologies and software products.

About the company:
We are IITK based startup working on a 'one-for-all' solution for a range of problems faced by students. Campus Haat is a hyperlocal community platform where all the students, professors, residents, local vendors can join, participate, and eventually benefit each other. We aim to minimize the cost of education by providing better resources at an affordable price. Our main area of focus is resource sharing (P-2-P), academics, food, transportation, and accommodation. We are creating a mobile & web solution aimed to solve problems using a combination of online-offline approach.
About the internship/job:
We are looking for passionate Java developers who want to solve real-world problems using the latest technologies, someone who wants to keep learning and push the limits to make a real-life impact. Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Design and develop a scalable and robust system/web-services to be used by mobile and web applications (Android/iOS/web) 2. Design and create database models (both relational/MySQL and NoSQL/DynamoDB) 3. Design and create REST API 4. Create test cases, write scripts, including edge cases 5. Fix bugs and work on performance optimizations
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for the part time job/internship (it may be part time in-office or part time at home/work from home online)
have relevant skills and interests
can start the part time job/internship between 31st Oct'19 and 30th Nov'19
are available for duration of 3 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 2
Categories: Java,Software Development,Computer Science,Engineering

Job SummaryAbout Us: HAP Labz is a start up - professional Web and Mobile development company based in India that endeavor on highly proficient, timely delivered, cost effective front-end and back-end software development services. Our team is highly experienced in offering offshore software development and project management. Some of our services includes but not limited to Web application development, Mobile application development, E-Commerce development and Desktop application development. Founders come with good experience, displays acute software expertise and has been successful in providing high-level services, support and solutions to our clients in India, Singapore, Australia, United States, Canada and Estonia to mention a few. We strongly believe in equal mix of hard and smart work and look forward to work in various industry verticals and provide an efficient, reliable, secure and timely solution to our clients.Website: www.haplabz.comResponsibilities and DutiesAs a Junior Software Engineer, you will be learning new technologies, coding, testing and implementing configuration changes and assisting in the design of software applications to meet both functional and technical requirements. you will also play a major role in the organization's software development, implementation and management of technology-based business solutions.Qualifications and SkillsExcellent English communication verbal and writtenShould have good HTML and CSS knowledgeShould be good with any one of the programming languages [C, C++, Java, Javascript, Python, PHP, etc.,]Should be a quick learner and be capable of learning new technologies from online sources like video or web tutorials within a short spanAny Bachelors Degree2018 and 2019 passed out batches onlySpecialization in Computer Science, Computer Technology or Information Technology will be an added advantage but not a compulsionShould be capable of handling client's pressured deadlinesShould be capable of working alone or with a small team [As this is a start up, you may have to work alone or with one or two more developers]BenefitsOpportunity to learn latest technologies like Angular, React, Vue.js, Node.js etc.,You will be looking at yourself as a confident software developer by 1 year from the date of joiningYou being a part of a start up company, we ensure growth of employees in parallel with the company's growthSalary hike twice a year [Jan and July every year]5 day work policy [You may be asked to work on Saturday's if there is a requirement]Job Type: Full-timeSalary: ₹10,000.00 /monthLanguage:Excellent English Communication (Required)Industry:Software Development

About the company:
We are IITK based startup working on a 'one-for-all' solution for a range of problems faced by students. Campus Haat is a hyperlocal community platform where all the students, professors, residents, local vendors can join, participate, and eventually benefit each other. We aim to minimize the cost of education by providing better resources at an affordable price. Our main area of focus is resource sharing (P-2-P), academics, food, transportation, and accommodation. We are creating a mobile & web solution aimed to solve problems using a combination of online-offline approach.
About the internship/job:
We are looking for passionate Java developers who want to solve real-world problems using the latest technologies, someone who wants to keep learning and push the limits to make a real-life impact. Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Design and develop a scalable and robust system/web-services to be used by mobile and web applications (Android/iOS/web) 2. Design and create database models (both relational/MySQL and NoSQL/DynamoDB) 3. Design and create REST API 4. Create test cases, write scripts, including edge cases 5. Fix bugs and work on performance optimizations
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for the part time job/internship (it may be part time in-office or part time at home/work from home online)
have relevant skills and interests
can start the part time job/internship between 31st Oct'19 and 6th Dec'19
are available for duration of 3 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 2
Categories: Java,Software Development,Computer Science,Engineering
